profile_summary:
Niya Shiyas is a highly skilled full stack web developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as C, JavaScript, and TypeScript. As a tech lead at TinkerHub MEC and web lead at FOSS MEC, Niya has demonstrated exceptional technical expertise and leadership abilities, driving innovative solutions and collaborations. With a growing professional network of 52 followers and an impressive portfolio of 49 public repositories, Niya has established herself as a reliable and accomplished developer in the industry.

As a dedicated and innovative professional, Niya continues to make significant contributions to the field of web development, leveraging her expertise to drive projects forward and mentor others. With a strong presence in the tech community, including her participation in GHC'23, Niya is well-versed in the latest technologies and trends, allowing her to deliver high-quality solutions that meet the evolving needs of the industry. As a member of the class of MEC'25, Niya is committed to ongoing learning and growth, ensuring that her skills remain up-to-date and aligned with the latest industry standards, making her a valuable asset to any project or organization.
